text: Ara manusake yakhana duhkha-dain'ya sparsa kare takhana se ekagracitte tara rabake dake. Tarapara yakhana tini nijera paksa theke tara prati anugraha karena takhana se bhule yaya tara age yara jan'ya se dekechila tamke ebam se allahara samakaksa damra karaya, an'yake tamra patha theke bibhraanta karara jan'ya.
